
 Seam Spring Module
 CDI Integration for Spring Framework
 ${project.version}

 What is it?
 ===========

 The Seam Spring Module provides enhanced CDI integration for the Spring Framework.

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 artifacts/
 
    Provided libraries

 lib/

    Dependencies

 doc/

    API Docs and reference guide
  
 examples/

    Examples for module
    
 source/

    Source code for module
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 Software License, Version 2.0 (ASL).

 Seam Spring URLs
 ===============

 Spring Module page:  http://sfwk.org/Seam3/Spring
 Seam 3 project:      http://sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:           http://sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:              http://sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:         http://github.com/seam/spring             
 Issue Tracking:      http://issues.jboss.org/browse/SEAMSPRING

 Release Notes
 =============
